8. Monitoring:
8.1 Monthly meeting: To assess the eff ectiveness of implementation of the JSY , ANMs 
should hold monthly meetings of all AS HAs/related link health workers under 
them, possibly on a fi xed day (such as the third Friday) of every month, at the SC 
or at any anganwadi centre falling under their jurisdiction. If the scheduled day 
happens to be a holiday, the meeting could be held on the following working day.
